# isArray

> Test if a value is an array.


<section class="usage">

## Usage

``` javascript
var isArray = require( '@stdlib/utils/is-array' );
```


#### isArray( value )

Tests if a value is an `array`.

``` javascript
var value = [];

var bool = isArray( value );
// returns true
```

</section>

<!-- /.usage -->


<section class="examples">

## Examples


``` javascript
var isArray = require( '@stdlib/utils/is-array' );

var bool = isArray( [ 1, 2, 3, 4 ] );
// returns true

bool = isArray( {} );
// returns false
```

</section>

<!-- /.examples -->
